content.rendered:
Formcase is a worldwide partner for innovative digital solutions in the education sector and specialized in producing customized individual solutions for every customer.

Transformer Case Series

Home of the strongest charging trolleys
All trolleys of Formcase are compatible with the new Apple iPad 10,2″ 2021 (9. generation).
Please note, that the new iPads  (from 8. generation) are delivered with Lightning to USB-C cables
Request Quote

TransformerCase T10C

For up to 10 tablets
Charge Only via USB-C or USB-A

Specifications

Dimensions + Weight

Length 549 x Width 346 x Height 236mm (Airplane Cabin Size); Weight: 6,9 Kg

Max. dimensions tablet compartment

Length 285 x Width 23 x Height 200mm

Security

Device for padlock (ABUS combination lock optionally available)

Cooling

Active ventilation system (max. noise emission 31dBA, air capacity: 39m3 / h)

Charging power / Current

Up to 5V, 2,1A (12W) per USB Port – 100 – 240 V – 50/60 Hz

Power switch

On/off switch

Transportation

2 wheels (built in), extractable handle + carrying handles on both sides

Compatibility

For up to 10 tablets with max. 11“ incl. protective cover (max. 285x23mm)

Connections inside + outside

Outside: Power connection, Inside: 10x USB-A Port

Material

Polyprophylen + glass fiber composite material

Scope of delivery:

1x 2m Power cable – EU/UK Version 1x Instructions manual

Applied standards

DIN EN 55022 / DIN EN 61140 / DIN EN 55024 / DIN EN50581 / DIN EN62368-1

Certificates

CE / RoHS / REACH

Customs tariff number

42021250

Warranty

1 year manufacturer warranty

Country of manufacture

Made in Germany

TransformerCase T16 Pro

For up to 16 tablet
Sync & Charge via USB-C or USB-A

Specifications

Dimensions + Weight

Length 690 x Width 380 x Height 358mm; Weight: 13,9 Kg

Max. dimensions tablet compartment

Length 200 x Width 24 x Height 270mm

Security

Device for padlock (ABUS combination lock optionally available)

Cooling

Active ventilation system (max. noise emission 31dBA, air capacity: 39m3 / h)

Charging power / Current

Up to 5V, 2,4A (12W) per USB Port – 100 – 240 V – 50/60 Hz – On/off switch

Datatransfer

Up to 480Mbps

Transportation

2 wheels (built in), extractable handle + carrying handles on both sides

Compatibility

For up to 16 tablets with max. 11“ incl. protective cover (max. 200x24mm)

Connections inside + outside

Outside: Power connection + RJ45 connection (optional), Inside: USB-B Sync Port

Material

Polyprophylen + glass fiber composite material

Scope of delivery:

1x 2m Power cable – EU/UK version
1x USB-B to -C data cable
1x Instructions manual
16x Rubber grommets for cable fixation

Applied standards

DIN EN 55022 / DIN EN 61140 / DIN EN 55024 / DIN EN50581 / DIN EN62368-1

Certificates

CE / RoHS / REACH

Customs tariff number

42021250

Warranty

1 year manufacturer warranty

Country of manufacture

Made in Germany

(5V 4A/9V 2.1A /12V 1.7A) with Type-C-Ports and up to 20W per Port

2 wheels (built in), extractable handle + carrying handles on both sides

1x Instructions manual
16x Rubber grommets for cable fixation

TransformerCase T48C Pro - USB-A

Charge Only! For up to 48 devices – Max. 11“

Specifications

Dimensions (L/W/H) Length 680 x Width 480 x Height 1000mm

Weight 46 Kg

Max. Dimensions per Slot Length 275 x Width 22 x Height 195mm

Security Integrated lock system (Keys included in the delivery scope)

Cooling Active cooling system (4x Fans); max. 31dBA, Air flow: 39m3/h

LED Charging Status Indication Yes, Charging-> red, – Fully charged-> green

Charging Power / Current 48-port USB-A intelligent charging hub with automatic charging cut-off & charge distribution (No timer necessary) -> Also works as overheating and overcharging protection

Up to 5V, 2.4A (12W) per USB port – 100 – 240 V – 50/60 Hz – Total power: 580W Integrated On/Off – (I/O) switch

Synchronisation No

Data transfer No

Transport 4 integrated smooth-running castors, 2 with parking brake Integrated moving handle

2 side carrying handles for moving over steps

Protective Cover For up to 48 tablets with max. 11“ incl. thick protective cover

Device Compatibility Apple iPads + Android Tablets

Connections Inside + Outside Outside: IEC Socket + 2x Extra Socket

Labelling Option Yes

Cable Management Perfectly in use with short charging cables

Material Sheet metal + aluminium alloy + FR-ABS

Delivery Scope: 1x 2m Power cord – (Version depending on the country) 1x Manual

2x Keys for locking system

Applied Standards DIN EN 55022 / DIN EN 61140 / DIN EN 55024 / DIN EN50581 / DIN EN62368-1

Certificates CE / RoHS / REACH

Customs Tariff Number 8504409999

Warranty 1 year manufacturer‘s warranty (Warranty extension optionally available)

Country of Manufacture China

 

TransformerCart T36-PD-Perf-USB-C

For up to 36 devices with max 15,6″
Charging via Power Delivery USB-C (60W)

Specifications
Dimensions:1086 x 594 x 463mm (HxWxD)
Weight:62KG
Device compatibility:USB-C chargeable Laptops
Device Size:Up to 36 devices with a max. of 15,6″
Compartment dimensions for tablets:396 x 268 x 23,3mm (HxWxD)
Power Supply:On/off switch
Security:Lockable by integrated locks
Charging Power:Supports power delivery voltages up to 20V
Cooling:Active ventilation system
Material:Sheet Metal + Aluminum Alloy + FR-ABS
Color:Black
Certifications:CE, REACH, RoHS
Standards:DIN EN 60950-1, DIN EN 55022, DIN EN 55024
Country of Manufacture:Made in China
Manufacturers’ Warranty:1 year manufacturer warranty
 

TransformerCart T32 Pro

For up to 32 tablets + extra space
Charge Only via USB-C Ports (20W per USB-Port)

Specifications

Dimensions + Weight

Length 680 x Width 480 x Height 1000mm; Weight: 46 Kg

Max. dimensions tablet compartment

Length 275 x Width 22 x Height 195mm

Security

Integrated Lock-System (Keys attached to the scope of delivery)

Cooling

Charging power / current

Supports all USB-PD Power Delivery Voltages from 5V to 12V.
(5V 4A/9V 2.1A /12V 1.7A) with Type-C-Ports and up to 20W per Port

Power switch

On/ off switch

Transportation

4 easy wheels (2 including break system) – Side handles for carrying

Compatibility

Supports Tablets and iPads with max. 11“
„Fast Charging“ for the iPad 10,2“ 2019/2020/2021 (7th, 8th and 9th Generation)

Connections inside + outside

Outside: 2x Schuko outlet/socket + 1 USB 5VDC , Inside: 32x USB-C-PD Ports

Material

Sheet metal + Aluminum alloy + FR-ABS

Scope of delivery:

1x 2m Power cable – EU/UK Version 1x Instructions manual
2x Keys for integrated lock

Applied standards

DIN EN 55022 / DIN EN 61140 / DIN EN 55024 / DIN EN50581 / DIN EN62368-1

Certificates

CE / RoHS / REACH

Customs tariff number

42021250

Warranty

1 year manufacturer warranty

Herstellungsland

China

TransformerCart T30 (AC Version)

Up to 30 devices Charging via Power Sockets Laptops up to 15.6”
Charging via Power Delivery USB-C (60W)

Specifications

Dimensions + Weight

Length 620 x Width 660 x Height 1160mm; Weight: 72,6 Kg

Max. dimensions laptop compartment

Length 405 x Width 43 x Height 290mm

Security

Integrated Lock-System (Keys attached to the scope of delivery)

Cooling

Active ventilation system max. 31dBA, air capacity: 39m3/h (4 integr. Fans)

Charging power / current

AC 100V~240V 16A(MAX), Installed Power: 3000W

Power switch

On/ off switch

Transportation

4 easy wheels (2 including break system) – Side handles for carrying

Charging Mode

When the total current is greater than 16A (total power ÷ AC voltage = total current), the device automatically stops working and manually switches to the circulating mode

Connections inside + outside

Outside: 1x power cord, Inside: 30x power outlets

Material

Sheet metal + flame retardant ABS

Scope of delivery:

1x 2m Power cable – EU/UK Version 1x Instructions manual
2x Keys for integrated lock

Applied standards

DIN EN 55022 / DIN EN 61140 / DIN EN 55024 / DIN EN50581 / DIN EN62368-1

Certificates

CE / RoHS / REACH

42021250
